subject: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN5147 has been delivered
description_text:
Hi I just received this order and my package did not come with the haptics
that are supposed to be included in the kit I purchased. I would also like
the baseplate and the U shaped brackets

conversations.body_text: Hi JJ,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, the haptics are currently out of stock at our China warehouse as well—they're simply too popular. We'll be able to ship yours next Monday.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195322205         Happy New Year!
